Package org.forgerock.openam.uma

Interface UmaSettings

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    UmaProviderSettings
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    UmaSettingsImpl
    public interface UmaSettings
    Models all of the possible settings the UMA provider can have and that can be configured.
    Since:
    13.0.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      String getAuditLogConfig()
      Gets the config file to be used to store Uma audit
      long getPermissionTicketLifetime()
      Gets the lifetime an permission ticket will have before it expires.
      ResharingMode getResharingMode()
      Gets the configured re-sharing mode.
      long getRPTLifetime()
      Gets the lifetime an RPT will have before it expires.
      Set<String> getSupportedAATGrantTypes()
      Gets the supported AAT Grant Types.
      Set<String> getSupportedAATProfiles()
      Gets the supported AAT Profiles.
      Set<String> getSupportedClaimTokenProfiles()
      Gets the supported claim token profiles.
      Set<String> getSupportedPATGrantTypes()
      Gets the supported PAT Grant Types.
      Set<String> getSupportedPATProfiles()
      Gets the supported PAT Profiles.
      Set<String> getSupportedRPTProfiles()
      Gets the supported RPT Profiles.
      Set<URI> getSupportedUmaProfiles()
      Gets the supported UMA profiles.
      String getUserProfilePreferredLocaleAttribute()
      Gets the attribute on the user's profile which stores the user's preferred locale.
      String getVersion()
      Gets the supported version of the UMA specification.
      boolean isEmailRequestingPartyOnPendingRequestApprovalEnabled()
      Gets whether the Requesting Party should be emailed when a Pending Request is approved by the Resource Owner.
      boolean isEmailResourceOwnerOnPendingRequestCreationEnabled()
      Gets whether the Resource Owner should be emailed when a Pending Request is created when a Requesting Party requests authorization for a resource.
      boolean isTrustElevationRequired()
      Gets whether the AAT is sufficient for determining the requesting party on the authorization request or trust elevation is required.
      boolean onDeleteResourceServerDeletePolicies()
      Gets whether a Resource Server's policies should be deleted when the Resource Server OAuth2 agent entry is removed, or the "uma_protection" scope is removed.
      boolean onDeleteResourceServerDeleteResourceSets()
      Gets whether a Resource Server's resource sets should be deleted when the Resource Server OAuth2 agent entry is removed, or the "uma_protection" scope is removed.

    • Method Detail

      • getVersion

        String getVersion()
        Gets the supported version of the UMA specification.
        Returns:
        The UMA version.

      • getSupportedPATProfiles

        Set<String> getSupportedPATProfiles()
                             throws ServerException

        Gets the supported PAT Profiles.

        NOTE: The "bearer" profile MUST be supported.

        Returns:
        The supported PAT profiles.
        Throws:
        ServerException - If there is a problem reading the configuration.

      • getSupportedAATProfiles

        Set<String> getSupportedAATProfiles()
                             throws ServerException

        Gets the supported AAT Profiles.

        NOTE: The "bearer" profile MUST be supported.

        Returns:
        The supported AAT profiles.
        Throws:
        ServerException - If there is a problem reading the configuration.

      • getSupportedRPTProfiles

        NOTE: The "bearer" profile MUST be supported.

        Returns:
        The supported RPT profiles.
        Throws:
        ServerException - If there is a problem reading the configuration.

      • getRPTLifetime

        long getRPTLifetime()
             throws ServerException
        Gets the lifetime an RPT will have before it expires.
        Returns:

        Throws:

      • onDeleteResourceServerDeletePolicies

        boolean onDeleteResourceServerDeletePolicies()
                                      throws ServerException
        Gets whether a Resource Server's policies should be deleted when the Resource Server OAuth2 agent entry is removed, or the "uma_protection" scope is removed.
        Returns:
        true if the policies should be deleted.
        Throws:
        ServerException - If there is a problem reading the configuration.

      • onDeleteResourceServerDeleteResourceSets

        boolean onDeleteResourceServerDeleteResourceSets()
                                          throws ServerException
        Gets whether a Resource Server's resource sets should be deleted when the Resource Server OAuth2 agent entry is removed, or the "uma_protection" scope is removed.
        Returns:
        true if the resource sets should be deleted.
        Throws:
        ServerException - If there is a problem reading the configuration.

      • isEmailResourceOwnerOnPendingRequestCreationEnabled

        boolean isEmailResourceOwnerOnPendingRequestCreationEnabled()
                                                     throws ServerException
        Gets whether the Resource Owner should be emailed when a Pending Request is created when a Requesting Party requests authorization for a resource.
        Returns:
        true if the Resource Owner should be emailed.
        Throws:
        ServerException - If there is a problem reading the configuration.

      • isEmailRequestingPartyOnPendingRequestApprovalEnabled

        boolean isEmailRequestingPartyOnPendingRequestApprovalEnabled()
                                                       throws ServerException
        Gets whether the Requesting Party should be emailed when a Pending Request is approved by the Resource Owner.
        Returns:
        true if the Requesting Party should be emailed.
        Throws:
        ServerException - If there is a problem reading the configuration.

      • getUserProfilePreferredLocaleAttribute

        String getUserProfilePreferredLocaleAttribute()
                                       throws ServerException
        Gets the attribute on the user's profile which stores the user's preferred locale.
        Returns:
        The user profile attribute for the user's preferred locale.
        Throws:
        ServerException - If there is a problem reading the configuration.

      • isTrustElevationRequired

        boolean isTrustElevationRequired()
                          throws ServerException
        Gets whether the AAT is sufficient for determining the requesting party on the authorization request or trust elevation is required.
        Returns:
        true if the trust elevation is required.
        Throws:
        ServerException - If there is a problem reading the configuration.
